did.unittitle: Group of men and women sitting at a picnic

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a group of boys and girls sitting on the grass enjoying a picnic. There are trees and a picket fence in the background. No identification.

did.unittitle: Horse drawn wagons in front of a wooden building

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a caravan of horse drawn buggies in front of a barn. The buggy in the center of the photo is covered and has a man sitting in it. Behind that buggy is another buggy with three women in and around it. No identification.

did.unittitle: Man in a wagon drawn by two horses

scopecontent.p: Photograph of an unidentified man sitting in a covered buggy being drawn by two horses. There is a wagon filled with hay in the background.

did.unittitle: Man in a wagon drawn by two horses

scopecontent.p: Photograph of an unidentified man sitting in a covered buggy being drawn by two horses. There is another unidentified man standing in front of one of the horses holding its bridle.

did.unittitle: Group of women, boys, and girls

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a group of unidentified boys and girls wearing suits and dresses with hats, respectively.
Photograph of a man standing in a yard smiling at a camera. In front of the man are two skinny dogs. In the background is another dog running along a fence. No identification.

did.unittitle: Two story house with a fence

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a two story house with a covered porch and trees in the front yard. There is a white fence enclosing the yard and a covered coach on the left side of the image.
Photograph of a wooden lean to with sticks and hay on the roof. There are piles of dirt in front of the lean to.
Photograph of a log cabin. Behind the log cabin is another single story building with a wagon in front of it.

did.unittitle: Tree with a fence behind it

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a tree in a field. Behind the tree is a fence created from large sticks.

Photograph of a makeshift covering created from logs for the supports and sticks/hay for the roof covering. Underneath the covering are some tables and equipment for cooking. There is an unidentified woman on the right side of the photo.
Photograph of an unidentified woman wearing a white shirt, bowtie, and dark skirt. She has her hair pulled back from her face and is smiling at the camera.
Photograph of two young children standing with a dog between them. There is a building and a hill in the background behind them. No identification.

did.unittitle: Boy holding the collar of a dog

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a young boy wearing a checkered shirt, overalls, and a bowtie holding the collar of a medium sized dog. In the background is a fence and land with sagebrush covering it. No identification.

did.unittitle: Horses in front of a stable

scopecontent.p: Photograph of three horses in a paddock outside of a barn. There is a feeding trough in the center of the paddock, and two hay lofts of either side of the barn.

Photograph of a boy wearing pants with suspenders, a white shirt, and a wide brimmed hat. He is standing over a white dog. In the background is a fence and a hexagonal windmill shaped structure. No identification.
Photograph of a young boy wearing a suit and hat sitting on a lawn. Behind him is a house. No identification.

did.unittitle: Boy standing on grass holding a pole

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a young boy wearing a suit and hat standing in front of a house. He is holding a tall wooden stick in his left hand. No identification.

did.unittitle: Baby sitting next to a door

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a young toddler sitting on a porch next to a doorway leading into a house. The toddler is wearing a white dress and looking at the camera with a quizzical look. No identification.

did.unittitle: Two men sitting in a horse drawn wagon

scopecontent.p: Photograph of two men sitting in a covered wagon hitched to two horses. There is an American flag attached to the top of the wagon. No identification.

did.unittitle: Unidentified woman sitting in a chair

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a woman in a white dress sitting in a high backed chair near the porch of a house. There are some plants behind her. No identification.

did.unittitle: Person in a boat on a lake

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a person in a boat on a small lake. There is a hill on the other side of the water with some trees growing. No identification.
Photograph of a boy getting crouched over preparing to do a head/hand stand in a backyard. Behind him is a fence with some bushes in front of it. Caption on front: May 67 No identification.

Photograph of a deer with its head turned around so that it can lick its back in a field. In the background are parked cars and a building surrounded by trees (possibly a campground or forest welcome center).

did.unittitle: Deer in front of some trees

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a deer standing near some small trees and bushes looking at the camera.
Photograph of a patch of forest with trees and bushes growing on a slight incline.
Photograph of a group of children playing in a field next to a wooded hillside. No identification.

Photograph of two boys crouching near a campfire. There is a stream in the background where another child is playing. Caption on front: Apr 60. There are also pencil scribbles around the edges of the photograph. No identification.
Photograph of a boy standing in a stream holding his shirt in one arm and smiling at the camera. The opposite bank has large rocks and trees located on it. No identification.

did.unittitle: Woman standing by a picnic table

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a woman (possibly Patricia Clarkin Sparks) standing by a wooden picnic table with one of her hands rubbing her face. There are two young boys playing behind her. The picnic table is covered with the plates and cups from a meal. Caption on front: Apr 60.

did.unittitle: Children sitting on a grassy hill

scopecontent.p: Photograph of three children sitting on a small grassy area. In the backround is a wooded canyon. No identification.

did.unittitle: Leland Sparks Jr. working on a fence with Patricia watching

scopecontent.p: Photograph of Leland Sparks Jr. repairing a fence in his backyard. Patricia Sparks has stopped behind him holding a laundry basket. In the background are clothing lines with laundry attached to them. Caption on front: May 67.
Photograph of a deer looking at the camera while standing in a wooded patch of forest.

did.unittitle: Deer in a field near a fence

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a four deer laying in a field. There is a fence separating the field/grassy area from the cars parked on the other side.
Photograph of a tree lined road. Some of the trees have thick trunks.

did.unittitle: Two men standing on a road surrounded by trees

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a tree lined road. Some of the trees have thick trunks. There are two men standing in the middle of the road. No identification.
Photograph of a stream with some eddies and small rapids created by the rocks in the river.

did.unittitle: Snow covered bank of a stream

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a winter scene by a stream. There are snow covered trees on both banks of the river and snow covered rocks in the river.
Photograph of a boy wearing a sweatshirt with the hood up looking into the forest. No identification.

did.unittitle: Three kids playing in some water

scopecontent.p: Photograph of two boys and a girl playing in a stream. One of the boys appears to be crawling on his hands and knees, the other boy is standing in the stream, and the girl is floating on her stomach. Caption on front: Apr 60. No identificaiton.

did.unittitle: Boy and girl laying in a stream

scopecontent.p: Photograph of two boys laying in a small stream. There are plant lined banks along the river. No identification. Caption on front: Apr 60.

did.unittitle: Telephone wire along a city street

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a telephone pole in a city. There are two men standing at the bottom of the pole looking up. One of the men is possibly Leland Sparks Jr., who worked for a power company for a bit. Handwritten on verso: 12 KV. No identification.

did.unittitle: Birthday party for a child of Leland Sparks Jr.

scopecontent.p: Photograph of Leland Sparks Jr. and Patricia Sparks standing next to a table where their children are sitting waiting for food. There is a cake in the middle of the table, possibly indicating a celebratory dinner.

did.unittitle: Boy carrying two packs through a field

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a boy carrying two backpacks along a trail. There are trees on a slope in the background. No identification.

did.unittitle: Telephone wire along a city street

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a telephone pole in a city. There is a man on a ladder apparatus being lifted up toward the top of the telephone pole. Another man is standing at the front of the car where the apparatus is located. One of the men is possibly Leland Sparks Jr. Handwritten on verso: 12 KV.
Photograph of a stream running through a wooded area.

did.unittitle: Two women sitting on a couch

scopecontent.p: Photograph of two women sitting on a couch holding cups in their hands. There is a Christmas stocking hung on the wall above. The woman on the right is possibly Allie Burwitz Sparks. Caption on front: Dec 59.

did.unittitle: Boy reaching toward a baby in a crib

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a baby laying in a crib with its hands by its mouth. There is a boy wearing a striped shirt reaching into the crib to touch the baby. No identification.

did.unittitle: Conical cartoon tower with a moat surrounding it

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a conically shaped tower with small turrets and a drawbridge sitting in a small pool surrounded by grass and a low wall. There are people by the small wall looking at the tower. No identification.

did.unittitle: Cartoon house with a water wheel next to it

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a cartoonish looking house and water wheel next to it. There is an elf-like figurine sitting on a stone wall by the water wheel.
Photograph of two unidentified African American children, a boy and a girl, standing in a yard near a single story house. The boy is standing behind the girl.
Photograph of trees at the edge of a yard. In the center of the trees is a coniferous tree.
Photograph of trees at the edge of a yard, with the more prominent trees being deciduous.
Photograph of an unidentified African American boy crouching down and holding up what looks like a beagle puppy. There ground is covered in dirt and rocks.

did.unittitle: Trees at the edge of a lawn

scopecontent.p: Photograph of trees at the edge of a yard, with the more prominent trees being deciduous. There are a couple large branches at the top of the photograph in the foreground.
Photograph of deciduous trees. They do not have many leaves present on the branches.
Photograph of an African American girl wearing a floral patterned dress with a white collar standing in a yard. There are bushes at the edge of the yard.

did.unittitle: Stream with trees on both banks

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a river with dense growth on both banks. There is field on the bank to the right with some cows standing in the field.
Photograph of a single story cinder block building. There is an awning over the side of the house supported by eight posts.
Photograph of a river with possibly snow covered banks. There are trees on both banks of the river. Above the river appears to be some telephone lines.
Photograph of a small chihuahua standing on an elevated platform with white bricks next to it. In the background is a hillside.

did.unittitle: Small dog standing under some rock supports

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a small chihuahua or terrier standing within a stone triangle. In the background are the bricks of a building.

Photograph of a harbor with boats parked along a sidewalk. There are some large buildings on the other side of the harbor and a post with a winged lion statue at the top of it. Photograph was possibly taken in Venice, Italy.

did.unittitle: Bridge over a canal in Venice

scopecontent.p: Photograph taken from on a gondola in a canal. There are buildings lining both sides of the canal and an arched bridge going over the canal. On the canal are about five other boats with passengers. Possibly taken in Venice, Italy.

did.unittitle: Women sitting in a gondola on a canal

scopecontent.p: Photograph of four women sitting in a gondola on a canal while a gondolier steers the gondola. In the background are four story buildings lining the canal. Possibly taken in Venice, Italy.

did.unittitle: Building in front of a hillside

scopecontent.p: Photograph of the rear exterior of a building with square edges. There is natural growth behind the building and a hill in the background.

did.unittitle: Hillside with a pole at the base

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a hill with rocks and low bushes on it. A telephone line and pole are at the bottom of the hill.

did.unittitle: Three children playing in the snow

scopecontent.p: Photograph of three children playing in the snow. One of them is sitting on a sled and the other two are standing next to the sled. No identification.

did.unittitle: Three boys and a man under a tree

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a man and three boys standing next toa tree. All three are wearing hats. The boy on the right is holding a rifle. No identification.
Photograph of a large lake with a mountain ridge visible on the other shore. On the closer shore, the land is covered with small bushes.

did.unittitle: Two men standing on the shore of a bay

scopecontent.p: Photograph of two men standing near the shore of a bay. There is a boat on the right side of the image and a hill on the opposite side of the bay. No identification.

did.unittitle: Man gesturing to a dog on a stump

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a man standing next to a post where a dog is perched. The man is pointing in a direction and the dog is looking at the man. Possibly Martin Van Buren Sparks.

did.unittitle: Group of men and women sitting in a living room

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a group of people sitting on couches and the floor in a living room. Handwritten on verso: The Family Xmas 1951 at the folks 3305 Cannon. No identification.
Photograph of a field with a town in the background. There are some people out in the field, but it is unclear what they are doing.

did.unittitle: Two women walking along a cliffside path

scopecontent.p: Photograph of two women walking along a cliff path overlooking the ocean. The shoreline curves in the background of the photo to give the impression of a small bay. Handwritten on verso: Put my face toward the sea where there is Purity! No identification.

did.unittitle: Boy, girl, and mom sitting on a rock

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a woman sitting on a rock with three of her children surrounding her. Behind the group is a stream with trees lining the air. Handwritten on verso: Mom. No identification.

did.unittitle: Man sitting in a chair next to a dog

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a man sitting in a chair wearing a had and suit. There is a border collie sitting next to him and trees in the background. No identification.
Photograph of a view of trees and some telephone poles. Handwritten on verso: Across the street from our house - looking beyond in the foreground is the city.

did.unittitle: Two story house above a garage

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a two story house with a garage underneath the house. Handwritten on front above the three windows on the second story: Bedroom, back, bedroom.
Photograph of a boy wearing a scouts uniform in a backyard. He is standing at attention and giving a salute. Possibly Leland Sparks Jr. Photo developed by Bear Photo Service on September 26, 1938.

did.unittitle: Three children standing on a sidewalk

scopecontent.p: Photograph of three children standing on a sidewalk. There are bushes and trees along the sidewalk. Photo developed by Bear Photo Service on Mar. 22 ,1934.
Photograph of a dog sitting on a ledge in front of a door. The photograph may have been taken at Maud Sparks MacKenzie's mansion in Carmel, California.

did.unittitle: Man, woman, and baby sitting outside a house

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a woman sitting outside a house in a chair holding a baby boy. Crouching next to the chair is a man wearing a military uniform. Possibly friends of Nancy Lee or Leland Jr. Sparks from the Navy. No identification.

did.unittitle: Aunt Marie and Uncle Mark Beck

scopecontent.p: Photograph portrait of an elderly woman and man. Handwritten on verso: Aunt Marie & Uncle Mark Beck.

Photograph of a wedding reception. The bride and groom are sitting at the head table with three children in front of the table. There is a stage where one can see the electric guitar player in a band on stage. No identification.

did.unittitle: Man standing behind a set dinner table

scopecontent.p: Cyanotype of a man standing next to the wall of a dining room holding a teacup. In front of him is a dining table with plates, bottles, and cups on the table. No identification.
Cyanotype of a group of boys getting prepared for a tug-of-war. No identification.
Cyanotype of a group of boys sitting on the ground in a line holding a tug-of-war rope. There are men standing around the line looking toward the other side. No identification.

did.unittitle: Boys on the ground in a tug-of-war

scopecontent.p: Cyanotype of three boys holding a tug-of-war rope and pulling on it. There are some people standing in the backgorund and observing the progress. No identification.
Albumen print of a woman in a dark dress wearing a cap standing on a road. Behind her is a wall with ivy overgrowing it and a gate. No identification.

did.unittitle: Horse in front of a fence

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a horse standing in front of a fence. There is a barn visible in the background. The horse moved when the photo was taken, blurring the tail, rear left leg, and head of the horse a bit.

did.unittitle: Horse in front of a barn

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a horse standing in a paddock by a stable. The horse has a white streak on its face.
Albumen print of a portrait of a young boy in a suit and bowtie. His hair is parted down the middle of his head. No identification.
Albumen print of a large rock with trees around it. There are two women sitting on the rock. No identification.

did.unittitle: Forested area with boulders and trees

scopecontent.p: Albumen print of a forested area with large boulders in the path and trees in the middle and background of the photo.
Albumen print of two men on horseback. Both are wearing cowboy hats. No identification.
Photograph of a young girl wearing a striped dress. She is laying on a bed with her head resting on some pillows. No identification.

did.unittitle: Woman and girl standing in front of a window

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a woman and girl standing in front of a window. The woman has her arm around the girl and is smiling at the camera. The girl is looking to the right and pouting. No identification.

did.unittitle: Five month baby sitting on a couch

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a baby sitting on a striped couch. The baby is dressed in a white garment. Handwritten on verso: 5 mo. No identification.

did.unittitle: Two men standing in a field

scopecontent.p: Photograph of two men standing between two fields leaning against shovels. The field in front is plowed without any vegetation growing yet and the field in back has some vegetation growing. Handwritten on verso: June 26, 1911. No identification.

did.unittitle: Unidentified woman and Maud Sparks MacKenzie in a motorcar

scopecontent.p: Postcard from a photograph of two women sitting in a motorcar. Both are wearing dark dresses and hats. The woman on the right may be Maud Sparks MacKenzie. Postcard.

Photograph of a man on horseback with the horse facing away from the camera. The man is turned looking back toward the camera. In the background is a couple of men branding a calf and a wooden ranch building. No identification.

did.unittitle: Horse with a trainer in front of stables

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a horse with a trainer in front of it holding a bridle lead. Behind the horse are some stables. Possibly taken at the Sparks Alamo ranch in Reno, Nevada. No identification.

did.unittitle: Unidentified woman leaning against a bannister

scopecontent.p: Photograph of an unidentified young woman posing for the camera by leaning against the banister of an external stairway to a wooden house.

did.unittitle: Woman laying on her side in the grass

scopecontent.p: Albumen print of an unidentified young woman in a white dress. She is laying on a blanket and pillow in a yard with a fence in the background. No identification.

did.unittitle: Woman standing in front of a tree

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a woman wearing a white dress and a hat with flowers and ribbons to tie under her chin. She is standing in front of a tree. No identification.

relatedmaterial.p: The woman in photographs 01847 and 01848 is the same woman.

did.unittitle: Woman standing in front of some bushes

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a woman in a white dress and a hat with flowers and ribbons to tie under her chin standing next to a bush. She is holding one of the branches and smiling at the camera. No identification.

relatedmaterial.p: The woman in photographs 01847 and 01848 is the same woman.

did.unittitle: Man on horseback at the base of a hill

scopecontent.p: Photograph of an unidentified man in ranching clothes sitting on horseback. Behind him is a hill covered in sagebrush.

Postcard from a photograph of two unidentified men outside of a metal warehouse. One of the men is sitting on a box wearing a suit and tie. The other man is leaning on the box with one of his legs swung over the first man's leg and his arm on the first man's shoulder. Possibly some fraternity brothers of Charles Sparks.

did.unittitle: Field with trees at the edge

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a field of sagebrush with trees in the middle ground. In the background are some mountains. Stamped on verso: Print by Crandall's Palo Alto, Calif.

did.unittitle: Mountains at the edge of a field

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a field of sagebrush with trees in the middle ground. In the background are some mountains. Stamped on verso: Print by Crandall's Palo Alto, Calif.

did.unittitle: Men, horses, and a dog on a hillside in front of a valley

scopecontent.p: Photograph of five men, two horses, and a dog standing in a field of sagebrush. Four of the men are standing and one man is riding the left horse. Both horses are laden with bundles of provisions. In the background are mountains. Stamped on verso: Print by Crandall's Palo Alto, Calif.
Albumen print of an unidentified man with a center part in his hair, a mustache, and wearing a suit with a tie. He is on the right side of the image looking up and to the left at something.

relatedmaterial.p: The man in 01854 and 01855 are the same man.

scopecontent.p: Albumen print of an unidentified man with part on the right side of his head and the hair curled away from the part, a mustache, and wearing a suit with a tie. He has his arms crossed in front of him and is looking directly at the camera.

relatedmaterial.p: The man in 01854 and 10855 are the same man

scopecontent.p: Photograph of an unidentified woman wearing a white lace shirt, striped skirt, and necklace of pearls. She has her hair pulled up and is standing in a doorway with her arms behind her back.
Photograph of an unidentified woman wearing a white dress and a string of pearls. She is leaning on the edge of a doorframe with the door open behind her and is smiling at the camera.

Photograph of four men sitting and standing in front of the store front for Davison Realty. Two of the men are sitting in chairs, one is leaning against a doorframe, and one is standing in front of the doorway. The store to the left is Knox & Barton Assayers and Chemists. Handwritten on verso: HeadQuarters Co. A. 25 min. Goldfield. Mar. 16-'07. No identification.
Photographic portrait of three boys, one about nine years old, one about five years, and one about a year old. The older boys are working button down shirts and cardigans. No identification.
Albumen print of three women on donkeys with boxes attached to the saddles. The women are wearing dresses and hats. No identification.

relatedmaterial.p: Caption with image (unknown source): Goldfield ?

scopecontent.p: Photograph of twenty-one children and one woman standing or sitting in front of a building with bushes around the door. The children are wearing paper crowns holding Jack-O-Lantern puppets. They are smiling at the camera. No identification.

did.unittitle: Man and a cook in a room with mechanical equipment

scopecontent.p: Photograph of two men in a room of mechanical equipment. One of the men is sitting at a table with a plate, cup, and milk in front of him. He is using a fork to grab some food out of a pan the second man is holding. The second man is wearing an apron and chef's hat and holding a knife and the pan. No identification.
Oversized print of John Sparks in profile showing the left side of his face. Handwritten on front: Jno Sparks.

did.unittitle: Maud Sparks holding a painting palette

scopecontent.p: Photograph of Maud Sparks wearing a dark dress with a white blouse and dark bowtie. She has her hair pulled back and is holding a palette and brushes in her left hand and mixing colors using a brush in her right hand. In the background is a floral wallpaper and a photograph hung on the wall.

Oversized print of Patricia Clarkin Sparks' maternal grandparents. The woman is wearing her hair pulled back and curled bangs. The man is wearing a suit and tie with a cross tie pin. He has a mustache. Handwritten on verso: Patty Clarkin-Sparks Grandparents, Mother (Delores) side.

did.unittitle: Allie Burwitz Sparks sitting on a couch

scopecontent.p: Oversized print of Allie Burwitz Sparks sitting on a couch. She is wearing a floral patterned dress and jacket. In the background are two paintings in gilded frames.

did.unittitle: John Sparks, son of Benton H. Sparks

scopecontent.p: Oversized portrait of John Sparks, son of Benton H. Sparks. He is wearing a tweed suit and tie and has his arms crossed. Handwritten on verso: John Sparks.

did.unittitle: Jean MacKenzie on a Presbyterian missionary trip

scopecontent.p: Mounted photograph of Jean MacKenzie in a wheeled chair being supported by to Africans. There are two other African males holding supplies in bundles on their heads. Jean is tipping a pith helmet as a sign of greeting. In the background are palm trees. Handwritten on verso: Jean MacKenzie Aunty Mauds sister in law Missionary in Africa for Presbeterian Church.

did.unittitle: Maud Sparks as a young girl

scopecontent.p: Photograph of a hand colored drawing of Maud Sparks when she was about ten years old. She is wearing a gray dress with a white lace shawl around her neck. She is looking to the left and her hair is curled with ringlets. Handwritten on verso: Picture of Auntie Maud Sparks Please return to Patsy, Lee or thier children when I no longer can use. Love Nana C. 5-16-80.

Photograph of John Sparks sitting in a chair covered in a light blanket. He is wearing a white shirt, dark pants and vest, and a top hat. He is holding a piece of paper in his right hand and sitting facing to the right so that he is in profile. Photograph prepared by Heyn.

Photograph of John Sparks sitting in a chair covered in a light blanket. He is wearing a white shirt, dark pants and vest, and a top hat. He is holding a piece of paper in his right hand and sitting facing toward the camera looking at a point beyond the camera to the left. Photograph prepared by Heyn.

did.unittitle: Men working at Sparks Alamo Ranch

scopecontent.p: Mounted photograph of ten men standing around a pit with wood on railroad ties. Some of the men holding wood on their shoulders. The man third from the right was John Sparks. Taken at the Sparks Alamo Ranch in Reno, Nevada. Handwritten on verso: Nov 16, 1907 Gov. Sparks Ranch, Reno, Nevada.

did.unittitle: Seven men standing with a herd of horses

scopecontent.p: Mounted albumen print of seven men standing in front of a herd of horses. In the background is a log barn and a enclosed area with a herd of cattle in it. No identification.

Mounted albumen print of the barn at Mayberry Ranch west of Reno. There is a large building with a small shed attached to the front part of the barn. There are some hills in the background. Handwritten on verso: Barn at Mayberry Ranch west of Reno 5 Mi. Print prepared by C.E. Skinner of the River Side Gallery.

did.unittitle: Unidentified woman working on a painting

scopecontent.p: Mounted photograph replica of a painting of an unidentified woman sitting in front of an easel. She is holding a thin rod in her left hand, a drawing implement in her right hand, and has her right arm resting on the edge of a chair. Next to her on the ground is an open painters box.

did.unittitle: John Sparks and Captain Cox riding in a parade

scopecontent.p: Photograph of Governor John Sparks (front) and Captain Cox (rear) from the Nevada State Police riding horses in what is most likely a parade. There are men standing on a sidewalk watching the governor and captain ride by on their horses. Possibly taken in Carson City, Nevada. Handwritten on verso: Gov Sparks & Capt. Cox of Nevada State Police, the horse that Sparks is riding is a Tennessee bred sadle horse.

did.unittitle: Benton H. Sparks and Sidney Reeves

scopecontent.p: Photograph of two young men riding horses through a grassy field. Handwritten on verso in pen: Left: Leland Sparks Right: a friend of Leland. Handwritten on verso in marker: 1978 - Uncle Beenie says that this is a picture of himself & a friend Sidney Reeves of Salt Lake City. He spent a year going to school in Reno & visiting (staying) with him & the family at the family home.

Unprocessed original negatives depicting: a ranch house (possibly the Sparks house at the Alamo ranch) around the turn of the twentieth century, people and animals, buildings at the Wedekind mine outside of Reno, Nevada. There are 48 negatives. Most are sheet film, but there are some roll film negatives.

Unprocessed original negatives depicting: a ranch house (possibly the Sparks house at the Alamo ranch) around the turn of the twentieth century, people and animals, buildings at the Wedekind mine outside of Reno, Nevada. There are 47 negatives. Most are sheet film, but there are some roll film negatives.

Album with an ornately carved leather cover. The spine has been broken and removed. Cabinet cards removed for ease of access. The inside pages have a paneled wooden finish and the album was held together with a metal clasp, which has been broken off.

separatedmaterial.p: Contained photos 00150-00166.

scopecontent.p: From an album which had a faux fur cover. Cabinet cards removed for ease of access. Written at the end of the album, "Pineapple juice for diptheria, cranberries for Eyeipelas(?)"

separatedmaterial.p: Contained photos 00091-00149
